name: Cheech and Chong Bud Farm
storyline:
It’s the 1970’s and stoner heroes Cheech and Chong find themselves stranded in the tiny town of Hierba Verde (“Green Herb”).
“Pretty quaint little spot maaan, but I could really use a joint.”
“You read my mind, ese! But where can we cop some grass?”

With only a few bucks and a pocket full of seeds, the boys enlist the help of some local businesses to help fatten their pockets and their stash! And with the crooked mayor on their payroll, Cheech & Chong are able to live the high life, turning a few modest buds into a lucrative pot empire!

The only downside? The fuzz is hip to the gig. Stadanko is bent on putting Cheech & Chong in jail for life. But with some help from their homies, the boys stay clear of his iron fist and have some off the hook adventures along the way.
summary: Cheech and Chong Bud Farm is a free-to-download and play hemp and marijuana lifestyle app, but some game items can be purchased for real money. A network connection is not required, but you will have limited access to in-game functions.
